Code:calculator
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Calci {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		int ch1, ch;
		do
		{
			System.out.println("\n1-addition\n2-subtract\n3-division\n4-multiplication\n5-factorial");
			System.out.println("enter your choice");
			ch=sc.nextInt();
			switch(ch)
			{
			case 1:
				System.out.println("enter two numbers for addition");
				int n1=sc.nextInt();
				int n2 = sc.nextInt();
				int sum= n1+n2;
				System.out.println("sum of the numbers is:" +sum);
				break;

			case 2:
				System.out.println("enter any 2 numbers for subtraction");
				int n3=sc.nextInt();
				int n4=sc.nextInt();
				int sub=n3-n4;
				System.out.println("subtraction of two numbers is: "+sub);
				break;

			case 3:
				System.out.println("enter any 2 numbers for multiplication");
				int n5=sc.nextInt();
				int n6=sc.nextInt();
				int mult=n5*n6;
				System.out.println("multiplication of two numbers is: "+mult);
				break;

			case 4:
				System.out.println("enter any 2 numbers for division");
				int n7=sc.nextInt();
				int n8=sc.nextInt();
				float div=n7/n8;
				System.out.println("division of two numebers is: "+div);
				break;

			case 5:
				System.out.println("enter the number for factorial");
				int n9 = sc.nextInt();
				int fact=1;
				for(int i=n9;i>1;i--)
				{
					fact=fact*i;
				}
				System.out.println("factorial is: "+fact);

				break;
			}
			System.out.println("do you want to continue press 1");
			ch1=sc.nextInt();
		}while(ch==1);
		System.out.println("thankyou");
	}

}
